sentence: Ski Concierge right near the Blackcomb base was top notch
Was going through some things and the tranquility hotel staff friendliness and peacefulness brought me back to life
Hotel has all the look feel and service you had expect from the Four Seasons
From Guest Services to Front Desk Restaurant In Room Dinning And Housekeeping you can See how welcoming caring And friendly everyone is
Amazing service across the board
As to the Whistler property itself the room was very nice and the service we encountered was uniformly excellent

Everyone and everything was on point from the moment we arrived and we greatly appreciated the personalized attention to detail and guest service befitting a 65th birthday celebration for my low key husband
The hotel felt warm and cosy and the weather was getting cooler so the fires in the room and in the main reception and dining areas were welcome
Lovely hotel in a quiet part of Whistler Very nice comfortable hotel with helpful concierge and a remarkably efficient ski valet service
The in room service was exceptional and food was hotWe also thoroughly enjoyed the sauna and hot tub during our stay
The concierge team is a mess
Other high end hotels do this as a complementary service or at a minimal cost
Concierge also got me a very last minute reservation at the Rimrock Cafe which was completely booked everywhere else
Despite all these problems I would still recommend the hotel because of how the front desk manager James took care of the problems
The housekeeping manager and the ski concierge manager also personally came and apologize
Concierge hit or miss overall very friendly but not very helpful
Went down for post ski drink and as a result of loud country music band and outside visitors was turned away and told to try room service
The staff does not know how to put on a duvet cover and did not fill up shampoos
The food was on point even room service arriving HOT
Shuttle service gets you everywhere you need to go and runs frequently
